cards.name: Batroc the Leaper
cards.ability: When a card moves, follow it to gain +2 Power. (once per turn)

cards.name: Beta Ray Bill
cards.ability: On Reveal: Shuffle Stormbreaker into your deck.

cards.name: Bullseye
cards.ability: Activate: Discard all cards that cost 1 or less from your hand. Afflict that many different enemy cards with -2 Power.)

cards.name: Cap's Shield
cards.ability: Ongoing: This can't be destroyed. Give your Cap +2 Power when this moves to Cap's location.

cards.name: Cobra
cards.ability: You can only play this at a location where your opponent has exactly one card.

cards.name: Diamondback
cards.ability: Ongoing: Enemy cards here afflicted with negative Power have an additional -2 Power.

cards.name: Grand Master
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move one of your other On Reveal cards here to the middle location. Its ability happens again.

cards.name: Iron Lad
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy the text of your deck's top card.

cards.name: Jean Grey
cards.ability: Ongoing: Players must play their first card here each turn. (if possible)

cards.name: Joaquin Torres Falcon II
cards.ability: Ongoing: The On Reveal abilities of your 1-Cost cards here happen twice.

cards.name: Kitty Pryde
cards.ability: When this returns to your hand, +1 Power. Returns at the start of each turn.

cards.name: Moonstone
cards.ability: Ongoing: Has the Ongoing effects of your 1, 2, and 3-Cost cards here.

cards.name: Phastos
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give each card in your deck -1 Cost or +2 Power.

cards.name: Pixie
cards.ability: On Reveal: Shuffle the base Costs of all cards in your deck that started there.

cards.name: Redwing
cards.ability: On Reveal: Return one of your other 1-Cost cards here to your hand to give it +2 Power.

cards.name: Sam Wilson Captain America
cards.ability: Game Start: Add Cap's Shield to a random location. Ongoing: You can move Cap's Shield.

cards.name: Sasquatch
cards.ability: Costs 1 less for each card you played last turn.

cards.name: Snowguard
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add the Hawk and Bear auroras to your hand.

cards.name: Supergiant
cards.ability: On Reveal: All cards played next turn don't reveal until the game ends.

cards.name: Thaddeus Ross
cards.ability: When your opponent ends a turn with unspent Energy, draw a card with 10 or more Power.

cards.name: Valentina
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a random 6-Cost card to your hand. Give it -2 Cost and -2 Power.

cards.name: Victoria Hand
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your cards that were created in your hand have +2 Power.

cards.name: X-23
cards.ability: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

items.name: Arishem
changes: 7/7 - At the start of the game, +1 Max Energy. Shuffle 15 random cards into your deck.
7/7 - Game Start: Shuffle 12 new cards into your deck. On turn 3, get +1 Max Energy.

items.name: Typhoid Mary
changes: 4/10 - Ongoing: Your other cards here have -1 Power.
4/10 - Ongoing: Your other cards here have -2 Power.

items.name: Alioth
changes: 6/10 - On Reveal: Remove the text from all unrevealed enemy cards here.

items.name: Enchantress
changes: 4/5 - On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards here.

items.name: Black Widow
changes: 3/4 - Activate: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand.

items.name: Frigga
changes: 3/3 - On Reveal: Add a copy of the last card you played to your hand. (if able)

items.name: Shuri
changes: 4/1 - On Reveal: If you play your next card at this location, double its Power.

items.name: Lockjaw
changes: 4/4 - After you play a card here, swap it with a card in your deck.

items.name: Stormbreaker
changes: 0/1 - On Reveal: Double Beta Ray Bill's Power.

items.name: Cerebro
changes: 3/0 - Ongoing: Your highest-Power cards have +2 Power.

items.name: Elsa Bloodstone
changes: 3/3 - Each card you play to fill your side of a location gains +2 Power.
